locations.dlcontext: Location identifier usng a URN-based identification string containing namespace and unique identifier within the namespace.Used as an externally meaningful identifier. Eg. urn:nzl:pri:location:FOL_ID:CL-9587-0176

identifier.dlcontext: Farm Identifier using a URN-based identification string containing namespace and unique identifier within the namespace. Used as an extremely meaningful identifier. Eg. urn:nzl:pri:farm:AgriBase:12345, urn:nzl:pri:farm:Farmax:67645

name.dlcontext: Name of the Farm. Eg. Green Acres Farm

type.dlcontext: Describes the type of enterprise the animals belong to. Enumeration : Own Stock, Finishing, Contract Grazing

use.dlcontext: Describes the use of the enterprise the animals belong to. Values can be Stud, Commercial

owner.dlcontext: Describes the person who owns the animals and/or the enterprise.

organization.dlcontext: Organisation that owns or controls the farm

contactPoint.dlcontext: Contact details of persons responsible for the farm

transactions.dlcontext: Provides further information on the types and identifiers for transactions related to stock reconciliation and the details of those transactions.
